original_text: The Lord's Spirit gave Samson great strength. He tore the lion into pieces with his hands. He made it seem very easy, as if he was killing a goat. But he did not tell his father or his mother what he had done.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 삼손에게 강하게 임하니 그가 손에 아무것도 없이 그 사자를 염소 새끼를 찢는 것 같이 찢었으나 그는 자기가 행한 일을 부모에게 알리지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord's Spirit gave Samson great strength
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 영이 삼손에게 큰 힘을 주셨다

sentences.original_text: He tore the lion into pieces with his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 손으로 사자를 찢어 조각 냈다

sentences.original_text: He made it seem very easy
as if he was killing a goat
But he did not tell his father
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그의 아버지에게 말하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: or his mother what he had done
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그의 어머니에게 자기가 한 일을
